title: Track Awesome Mirth Updates Daily

items.title: Awesome Mirth Updates on May 15, 2024
items.content_text:
### Mirth Extensions

*   üîß [Mirth Connect Privacy Plugin (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/tonygermano/mirth-user-privacy-plugin) - This plugin for Mirth Connect performs two functions to prevent exposing details of your server and Personal Data to NextGen Healthcare.

### Tutorials

*   üìù [Code template for TLS (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/pacmano1/mirthstunnel) - For users without the TLS plugin, this code template library uses stunnel to enable in and outbound TLS connections. It is an attempt to ease the configuration of stunnel and do it on the fly.
*   üìù [Create SOAP WebService](https://cboyer.github.io/developpement/mirth-webservice-soap/) - French article to create a custom SOAP Webservice with java
items.content_html:
Mirth Extensions

  • üîß Mirth Connect Privacy Plugin (‚≠ê17) - This plugin for Mirth Connect performs two functions to prevent exposing details of your server and Personal Data to NextGen Healthcare.

Tutorials

  • üìù Code template for TLS (‚≠ê11) - For users without the TLS plugin, this code template library uses stunnel to enable in and outbound TLS connections. It is an attempt to ease the configuration of stunnel and do it on the fly.
  • üìù Create SOAP WebService - French article to create a custom SOAP Webservice with java

items.title: Awesome Mirth Updates on Dec 13, 2022
items.content_text:
### Official Docs & Quickstarts

*   üîß [Docker Images (‚≠ê91)](https://github.com/nextgenhealthcare/connect-docker) - Official Docker Image.

### Client API

*   üîß [Python Interface (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/renalreg/python-mirth-client) - A basic async Python interface for Mirth Connect.
*   üîß [C# API (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/feathersct/MirthConnect) - MirthConnect API for c#.net mirth 3.8+.

### Other

*   üîß [Mirth-Jest-Framework (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/vibinernesto/Mirth-Jest-Framework) - repository to perform unit-testing for mirth scripts outside/inside mirthconnect tool.

items.title: Awesome Mirth Updates on Aug 24, 2022
items.content_text:
